sub_title: Drying Technology, Heat and Mass transfer, Energy, Gas Sensors, VOCs measuring
summary:
I am an ambitious and highly skilled engineer with a strong academic background and extensive experience in both academia and industry. With a passion for research and a drive for innovation, I specialize in energy optimization, food machinery, drying technology, gas sensors, and industrial drafting.
As a university professor for five years, I had the opportunity to educate and inspire a diverse group of students. I employed interactive teaching methods, practical demonstrations, and case studies to create an engaging learning environment. My aim was to equip students with a strong foundation in industrial machinery and industrial drafting, empowering them for success in their future careers. Witnessing their growth and development, both academically and professionally, was an incredibly fulfilling experience.
With eight years of industry experience as an engineer and technical manager in the food industry, I have specialized in food processing and drying technologies. I have successfully implemented innovative solutions to optimize the processing of food materials, improving efficiency and product quality. 
 By combining my academic background, teaching experience, and industry knowledge, I aim to contribute to the development of innovative solutions that address complex challenges faced by the industry.
